about_the_game:
Step into the Shadows of the Human Mind


In Psychic Enigma, you take on the role of Dr. Michael Weaver, one of the most famous psychologists who would venture and test the darkest depths of the human mind. Unconventional treatment methods serve to help patients who face severe psychological issues because their minds have been overwhelmed by nightmarish scenarios that point to the origin of their afflictions.

A Journey Through Nightmares


Every patient that you talk to has been wracked by unresolved issues and hidden traumas, which have manifested as surreal and nightmarish landscapes. Your goal is to traverse these haunting visions, confront the horrors and search for the revelations hidden in the back of their mind. The further you plumb the depths of this strange world, the more you come to realize that something much more insidious is afoot.
In Chapter 1 you meet ex-teacher Janet Stone, who has been suffering from frequent nightmares in which her childhood memories get mixed up into such horrifying and surreal experiences. You have the challenge to find out the truth about her torment, help to face her inner devils, and finally restore peace of mind.

Features:

  • Explore Surreal Dreamscapes: Enter subconscious minds of your patients, where every object, shadow, and sound is a manifestation of their deepest fears and unresolved traumas.
  • Intricate Puzzles: Solve complex and thought-provoking puzzles that are woven into the fabric of the nightmare worlds, each designed to reflect the psychological struggles of your patients.
  • Psychological Horror at Its Core: Experience a narrative-driven horror game that blurs the lines between reality and nightmare, challenging you to maintain your sanity as you delve deeper into the unknown.
  • A Fight for Your Own Sanity: As you help your patients, the malevolent forces within their minds begin to take their toll on you. Will you be able to save them without losing yourself?

Wishlist Now and Prepare to Confront Your Inner Demons

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some dark psychological content that some people might not be liking it.
